name: QuickPerfTest
description: Quickly find perf regressions to your website under load. Powered by VS Online.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: websiteUrl
inputs.label: Website Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your application website url as http://www.your.app/home.html

inputs.name: testName
inputs.label: Test Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name the load test for tracking and correlation.

inputs.name: vuLoad
inputs.label: User Load
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum virtual users concurrently accessing the website.

inputs.name: runDuration
inputs.label: Run Duration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Load test run duration in seconds.

inputs.name: geoLocation
inputs.label: Geo Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Geographical region from where the load will be generated.

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Alternate credential username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add the variable Alternate.Username in Variables tab with appropriate value.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Alternate credential password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add the variable Alternate.Password in Variables tab with appropriate value.

inputs.name: CltAccountUrl
inputs.label: VSO Account URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add the variable Alternate.VsoAccountUrl in Variables tab pointing to Cloud-based Load Test service endpoint.
